messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was shift in thinking/ now controlling again
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/26/02 7:55:05 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Thanks Kelli! :o) ... This is so right on! And every time I read someone complaining that the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/26/02 7:55:05 AM Central Daylight Time,
kellitraas@... writes:

> Anyway, Nancy, I know what you are going through, I'm just glad that we
> have found this way of life and with the help and support of others we can
> lick these unhealthy/dysfunctional behaviors.
> If you ever need to vent like I do, go ahead and e-mail me.

Thanks Kelli! :o)
>
> I know some of you will wonder where this comes into unschooling, but for
> those of us who grew up this way, its much harder to live a free, joyful
> life and to me that is what unschooling can be.
>
> Thanks for being here, everyone!
> Kelli
>

This is so right on! And every time I read someone complaining that the posts
aren't *nice* enough, or that the list should be changed, or that the list
doesn't reflect how they *think* unschooling should be I think about this.
And how beautiful most days can be for me. And how glad I am to have this
list on the not so beautiful days.

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
